channel.title: Servers using other peoples No-ip adresses falsely
channel.description: the server at http://moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php?server=deadlyscape.hopto.org. is using my no-ip without my consent and then under the no-ip of mine is advertising a different server. Ygamerz.net this has happened to me 3 times and i would like that entry deleted. i do not wish people to be on my server at this time we are doing some major changes. if a moderator or someone with access to that would please delete that it would be much appreciated. if any proof is needed to show ownership of the server then please contact me either via the forums or via deadlyscape.hopto.org.

item.title: Servers using other peoples No-ip adresses falsely
item.dc:creator: @deadly990 deadly990
item.description:
@deadly990 wrote:

this is not a spam attack this is someone using my ip, someone who is not me or someone to whom i delegate responsibilities to, this isnt that stupid SYI type bot, its not nulls, its normal people logging onto my server because of someone else using my ip because of its uptime percent, im asking a moderator, or someone who has access to the database that controls moparscapes server status checker, to delete the entry for deadlyscape.hopto.org (my no-ip). so it would be much appreciated if you did not post any more in this thread.

Read full topic
